hero.byline: I am a Product Manager with a background in web design and software engineering.

product.title: Building cool tech
product.byline: My most recent experience comes from diving deep into the needs of users & the business that services them to build something truly unique.
product.description: I have really enjoyed being able to explore solutions to complex and intricate problems, whilst bringing a background centered in technical delivery to be able to correctly manage scope and viability within the bounds of a web application.

code.title: A love of coding
code.byline: A developer for three years now, I still enjoy nothing more than hitting the tools and putting ideas into reality.
code.description: I have worked professionally as a Frontend developer and also have a deep understanding of the entire stack for most web applications.

footer.pre: Want to see how this website was made?
